this_title: Late Night Mayhem in Detroit: Witnessing a Fiery Hot Felony
introduction: Dan Bell and Jake Williams take a late night drive in Detroit. Finding themselves in one of the city's abandoned neighbourhoods long reclaimed by nature, they explore a burned out house before stumbling upon an unexpected adventure -- witnessing the end result of a just committed crime.
chinese_title: Late Night Mayhem in Detroit: Witnessing a Fiery Hot Felony
